evam me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane
sālarājamūle tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi bhikkhavo ti
bhaddhante ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ bhagavā etadavoca
sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo bhikkhave desessāmi taṃ suṇātha
sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmī ti evaṃ bhante ti kho te bhikkhū
bhagavāvato paccassosuṃ bhagavā etadavoca

idha bhikkhave assutavā pu
thujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadha
mme avinīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvi sappurisadhammassa akovido
sapparisadhamme avinīto pathaviṃ pathavito sañjānāti pathaviṃ pa
thavito sañatvā pathaviṃ mañati pathaviyā mañati pathavito
mañati pathaviṃ meti mañati pathaviṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ āpato sañjānāti āpaṃ āpato sañatvā āpaṃ pañati āpasmiṃ pañati āpato mañati
āpaṃ meti mañati āmaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi tejaṃ tejato sañjānāti tejaṃ tejato sañatvā tejaṃ mañati tejasmiṃ mañati
tejato mañati tejaṃ meti mañati tejaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñatita tassā ti vadāmi vāyaṃ vāyato sañānāti vāyaṃ vāyato sañatvā vāyaṃ ma
ñati vāyasmiṃ mañati vāyato mañati vāyaṃ meti mañati vāyaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetuṃ appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

bhūte bhūtato sañjānāti bhūte bhūtato
sañatvā bhūte mañati bhūtasmiṃ mañati bhūtato mañati bhūte meti mañati bhūte abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi bhū deve devato sañjānāti deve devato sañatvā
deve mañati devesu mañati devato mañati deve meti mañati deve abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito sañjānāti pajāpatiṃ
pajāpatiṃto sañatvā pajāpatiṃ mañati pajāpatismiṃ mañati pajāpatito mañati pajāpatiṃ meti mañati pajāpatiṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appari
ñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi brahmaṃ brahmato sañjānāti brahmaṃ brahmato sañatvā brahmaṃ mañati brahmanimañati brahmato mañati brahmaṃ meti mañati brahmaṃ abhina
ndati taṃ kissa hetu apariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ābhassare ābhassarato sañjānāti ābhassare ābhassarato sañatvā ābhassare mañati ābhassaresu
mañati ābhassarato mañati ābhassaraṃ meti mañati ābhassare abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi subhakiṇhe subhakiṇhato sañjānāti subhakiṇhe subhakiṇha
to sañatvā subhakiṇhe mañati subhakiṇhesu bhamañati subhakiṇhato mañati subhakiṇhe meti mañati subhakiṇhe abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vehapphale
vehapphaleto sañjānāti vehapphale vehapphalato sañatvā vehapphale mañati vehapphalesu mañati vehapphaleto mañati vehapphale meti maña
ti vehapphale abhinandati taṃ kissa hetuṃ appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi abhibhuṃ abhibhuto sañjānāti abhabhu abhibhūto sañatvā abhibhūṃ mañati abhibhū
smiṃ mañati abhibhūto mañati abhibhuṃ meti mañati abhibhuṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsāna
ñcāyatanato sañjānāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato sañatvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ pañati ākāsānañcāyatanasmiṃ mañati ākāsānañcāyatanato
mañati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ meti mañati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanato sañcānāti
viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanato sañatvā viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ mañati viñāṇañcāyatanasmiṃ mañati viñāṇañcāyatanato mañati viñāṇa
ñcāyatanaṃ meti mañati viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ākiñcañāyatanaṃ ākiñcāñcañāyatanato sañjānāti
ākiñcañāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanato sañatvā ākiñcañāyatanaṃ mañati ākiñcañāyatanasmiṃ mañati ākiñcañāyatanato mañati ākiñca
ñāyatanaṃ meti mañati ākiñcañāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanato sañjānāti neva
sañānātisañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanato sañatvā nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ mañati nevasañānāsañāyatanasmiṃ mañati nevasañānāsañāyatanato mañati
nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ meti mañati nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato sañjānāti diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭha
to sañatvā diṭṭhaṃ mañati diṭṭhasmiṃ mañati diṭṭhato mañati diṭṭhaṃ meti mañati diṭṭhaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sutaṃ sutato sañjānāti su
taṃ sutato sañatvā sutaṃ mañati sutasmiṃ mañati sutato mañati sutaṃ meti mañati sutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi mutaṃ mutato sa
ñjānāti mutaṃ mutato sañatvā mutaṃ mañati mutasmiṃ mañati mutato mañati mutaṃ meti mañati mutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viñātaṃ viñātato sañjānāti viñātaṃ
viñātato sañāñatvā viñātaṃ mañati viñātasmiṃ mañati viñātato mañati viñātaṃ meti mañati viñātaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

ekattaṃ ekattato sañjānāti ekattaṃ
ekattato sañatvā ekattaṃ mañati ekattasmiṃ mañati ekattato mañati ekattaṃ meti mañati ekattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nānattaṃ
nānattato sañjānāti nānattaṃ nānattato sañjātvā nānattaṃ mañati nānattasmiṃ mañati nānattato mañati nānattaṃ meti mañati nānattaṃ abhinanda taṃ kissa hetu appari
ñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sabbaṃ sabbhato sañjānāti sabbhaṃ sabbhato sañatvā sabbhaṃ mañati sabbhasmiṃ mañati sabbhato mañati sabbhaṃ meti mañati sabbhaṃ abhinandati appari
ñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañatvā nibbānaṃ mañati nibbānasmiṃ mañati nibbānato mañati nibbānaṃ meti mañati nibbānaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu appariñātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi puthujjanavasena pathamanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu sekho appattamānaso anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno viharati sopi pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti patha
viṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ mā mañi pathaviyāpa mā mañi pathavito mā mañi pathaviṃ meti mā mañi pathaviṃ māabhinandi taṃ kissa hetu pariñeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ...la...
āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcāñcañāyatanaṃ ne
vasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbhaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ mā mañi nibbānasmiṃ mā
mañi nibbānato mā mañi nibbānaṃ meti mā mañi nibbānaṃ māabhinandi taṃ kissa hetu pariñeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sekhavasena dutiyanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

yopi so bhikkhave
bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadañā vimutto sopi pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavi
to abhiñāya pathaviṃ na pañati pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathaviṃ meti na mañati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariñātaṃ tassā ti vadā
mi āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyata
naṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ suṃtaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbhaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na mañati
nibbānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi khīṇāsavavasena tatiyanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadañā vimutto sopi pathaviṃ pavito abhijānāti
pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya ta pathaviṃ na pañati pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathaviṃ meti na mañati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa
vītarāgattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhu ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ āki
ñcañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekkattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbhaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na
mañati nibbhānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vitarāgattā khīṇāsavavasena catutthanayabhūmiparicchedo
niṭṭhito

sopi yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadañā vimutto sopi pathaviṃ pathavito
abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ na mañati pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathavi meti na mañāñati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu kha
yā dosassa vītadotattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānasañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇa
ñcāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbhaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhi
ñāya nibbānaṃ na mañati nibbānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vītadosattā khīṇāsavavasena pañcama
nayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasayojano sammadañā vimutto sopi
pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ na mañati pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathaviṃ meti na mañati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ ki
ssa hetu khayā mohassa vītamohattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcā
yatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbhaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijā
nāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na mañati nibbānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vītamo
mohattā khīṇāsavavasena chaṭṭhanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

tathāgatoapi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathaviṃ na mañati pathaviyā
na mañati pathavito na mañati pathaviṃ meti na mañati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariñātaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpa
tiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanaṃ nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ vi
ñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbhaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato aabhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na mañati nibbānasmiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ me
ti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kibāssa hetu pariñātaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi satthuvasena sattamanayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito

tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho patha
viṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiñāya pathavi na mañati pathaviyā na mañati pathavito na mañati pathaviṃ meti na mañati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā
bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadā
mi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viñāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcañāyatanaṃ
nevasañānāsañāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbhaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiñāya nibbānaṃ na mañati nibbāna
smiṃ na mañati nibbānato na mañati nibbānaṃ meti na mañati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato
sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmi satthuvasena aṭṭhanamayabhūmiparicchedo niṭṭhito idamavoca bhagavā attamanā
te bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ pathamaṃ
